statements: SELECT * FROM HeatRecoveryProcess
SELECT ProcessDate, EfficiencyPercentage FROM HeatRecoveryProcess WHERE EfficiencyPercentage > 80
SELECT ProcessID, InletTemperature, OutletTemperature FROM HeatRecoveryProcess WHERE ProcessDate = '2022-09-15'
SELECT AVG(EfficiencyPercentage) AS AverageEfficiency FROM HeatRecoveryProcess
SELECT ProcessDate, InletTemperature, OutletTemperature, EfficiencyPercentage FROM HeatRecoveryProcess ORDER BY EfficiencyPercentage DESC
SELECT ProcessID, ProcessDate, InletTemperature, OutletTemperature, EfficiencyPercentage FROM HeatRecoveryProcess WHERE ProcessID = 1;
SELECT ProcessDate, InletTemperature, OutletTemperature, EfficiencyPercentage, ProcessID FROM HeatRecoveryProcess WHERE InletTemperature > 50 AND OutletTemperature < 80;
SELECT * FROM HeatRecoveryProcess WHERE EfficiencyPercentage BETWEEN 70 AND 80 ORDER BY ProcessDate DESC;
SELECT AVG(InletTemperature) AS AvgInletTemp, AVG(OutletTemperature) AS AvgOutletTemp FROM HeatRecoveryProcess;
SELECT ProcessDate, SUM(EfficiencyPercentage) AS TotalEfficiency FROM HeatRecoveryProcess GROUP BY ProcessDate HAVING TotalEfficiency > 300 ORDER BY TotalEfficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM HeatRecoveryProcess;
SELECT process_id, start_time, end_time FROM HeatRecoveryProcess ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT input_temperature, output_temperature FROM HeatRecoveryProcess WHERE input_temperature > 100;
SELECT process_id, efficiency FROM EfficiencyAnalysis WHERE efficiency >= 0.8;
SELECT analysis_id, process_id, efficiency FROM EfficiencyAnalysis ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM HeatRecoveryProcess WHERE process_id = 1;
SELECT process_id, start_time, end_time FROM HeatRecoveryProcess ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM EfficiencyAnalysis WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY analysis_timestamp ASC;
SELECT process_id, AVG(efficiency) AS avg_efficiency FROM EfficiencyAnalysis GROUP BY process_id;
SELECT * FROM HeatRecoveryProcess WHERE input_temperature BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM HeatExchanger;
SELECT id, temperature_in, temperature_out FROM HeatExchanger WHERE pressure_in > 10;
SELECT temperature_in, pressure_out FROM HeatExchanger WHERE temperature_out < 50;
SELECT id, heat_exchanged, efficiency FROM HeatRecovery WHERE date_recorded = '2022-01-15';
SELECT heat_recovery_id, temperature_diff, pressure_diff FROM ProcessData WHERE pressure_diff < 5;
SELECT * FROM HeatExchanger WHERE temperature_in > 50 AND pressure_out < 100
SELECT id, temperature_in, pressure_in FROM HeatExchanger WHERE temperature_out < 40
SELECT heat_exchanged, energy_recovered FROM HeatRecovery WHERE efficiency > 0.8
SELECT * FROM ProcessData WHERE temperature_diff BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY pressure_diff DESC
SELECT id, date_recorded FROM HeatRecovery ORDER BY efficiency
SELECT * FROM heat_exchanger;
SELECT id, inlet_temperature, outlet_temperature FROM heat_exchanger ORDER BY inlet_temperature DESC;
SELECT id, inlet_flow_rate, outlet_flow_rate FROM heat_reclaimer WHERE inlet_flow_rate > 50;
SELECT id, timestamp, efficiency FROM efficiency_analysis WHERE efficiency < 0.7 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, report_date, efficiency FROM efficiency_report WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM heat_exchanger WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT outlet_temperature, inlet_temperature FROM heat_exchanger WHERE id = 5;
SELECT AVG(efficiency) AS avg_efficiency FROM heat_exchanger;
SELECT * FROM efficiency_analysis WHERE efficiency > 0.75 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT H.*, R.heat_transfer_rate FROM heat_exchanger H JOIN heat_reclaimer R ON H.id = R.id WHERE H.efficiency < 0.6;
SELECT id, temperature_in, temperature_out, efficiency FROM HeatRecoveryProcess;
SELECT exchange_type, surface_area, efficiency FROM HeatExchangerData ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, heat_exchanged, inlet_temperature, outlet_temperature FROM HeatTransferLog WHERE heat_exchanged > 100;
SELECT data_id, device_id, power_consumed, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, efficiency_score, timestamp FROM EfficiencyAnalysis ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM HeatRecoveryProcess;
SELECT id, temperature_in, efficiency FROM HeatRecoveryProcess WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT exchange_type, efficiency FROM HeatExchangerData WHERE surface_area > 100 ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT timestamp, heat_exchanged, inlet_temperature, outlet_temperature FROM HeatTransferLog WHERE heat_exchanged > 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_type, efficiency_score, timestamp FROM EfficiencyAnalysis WHERE efficiency_score < 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp;
